item.title: 50.4.2 Multiplicative quaternion filtering (MEKF)
item.description: See also: Which orientation parametrisation to choose? Source: Markley 2014 Main idea is to use the quaternion as a global rotation representation a three component state vector as the local representation of rotation errors each term (q_true, delta_q, q_est) is a normalised unit quaternion Any of the rotation error representations can be used to calculate delta_theta, which is part of the error state of the MEKF.
